tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was in good Hands at AK dental clinic in Manikonda. I had visited for my tooth pain. Dr.Sudhakar has been meticulous in treating me. I was amazed by his commitment and precision. He took just 20 mins to reduce my tooth ache. My treatment got completed in 2 visits. Dr Sudhakar has helped me to calm down and take the treatment with peace.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My father required dental implants as he lost his front teeth and was not able to eat. We had initial consultation with Dr. sudhakar. Doctor is very nice and he explained really well about the implants procedure and gave us treatment plan. Normally implants are very costly and not affordable. But here implant treatment is really affordable and they also give us additional discount. Although the price was on the lower side there was no compromise on treatment quality. The implants are of international brand and they also prove us with warranty. I would recommend 100% to all those looking for dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: My journey with Ak dental started when I decided to get Invisalign for my teeth. Initially I did not know that braces are not for everyone. Dr Sudhakar explained clearly after examining my teeth which treatment suits best for my teeth with the help of some software. As my teeth are over crowded at some place and there were gaps in between, doctor suggested me to go for normal braces instead of Invisalign. Although Invisalign is more convenient, he told it will take longer time to get the result compared to braces. So I finally decided to get braces and I don't regret my decision. Doctor has literally saved me from getting whole in the pocket (as Invisalign is much costlier) and also saved my precious time. I'm so thankful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to ak dental clinic for second opinion as I was not sure. Dr Sudhakar did my consultation. He explained about all the possible treatment options and told clearly about how much time each one will take and other pros and cons. He is knowledgeable and very good in his field. He asked me for inputs and suggested which treatment would suit me and left the decision to me. I'm so thankful to him because I had the freedom to choose what I want instead of blindly going with one treatment suggested by doctors who don't take our opinions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was experiencing severe tooth pain and so I visited AK Dental as it was having good reviews. Dr. Sudhakar did an initial check-up and told that I need a root canal to treat the infection in one of my teeth. Along with rct, I had dental fillings for cavities. Doctor was very gentle and ensured that the procedure was as painless as possible. I definitely recommend this clinic to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to AK Dental due to severe tooth pain, after a thorough check-up, Dr. Sudhakar explained that I needed a root canal to treat the infection in my tooth, followed by a dental crown. The crown looks and feels just like a natural tooth. I am extremely happy with the results. Thanks to Dr. Sudhakar, my tooth pain is gone, and my tooth is fully restored, without loosing my natural teeth. The treatment cost was also reasonable, which made me attracted to them more. I'll definitely come here for my future needs.

review: I recently had Root canal done at my home town. But I missed to get crowns and returned to Hyderabad. So I searched online and found  AK dental clinic. There were many positives reviews for this one, so I planned my visit here by getting appointment online. I had consulted Dr Sudhakar and told him the treatment I've got in another clinic. As expected he told to get crowns and explained about the types of crows available. I asked for zirconia crowns. The staff took measurement and asked to come again after 5 days. On 4th day, they only called to remind me of the appointment and confirmed with me. Next day I had a smooth crown placement and it fitted well. It has been a week after that and I've no issues till now. I've to specially mention about the clinic ambience, it was simple and calming. The wait time was also short and staff are extremely friendly.
